name: VOID ATTACKERS
description:
VOID ATTACKERS is a space shooter inspired by classic retro games like Galaga (1981) and Space Invaders (1978). You play as a small spaceship defending itself from waves of evil enemy ships. You win money by destroying enemies, which allows you to upgrade your ship.

More updates will be coming very soon. This is only a sort of "demo" for what will be coming to VOID ATTACKERS.

Here is a list of some features you might expect to come in future updates:

  • More enemy types
  • Boss fights
  • Ship customization
  • More ship upgrades
  • New weapons & attacks
  • Some form of progression
  • Save system
  • Better UI
  • Controller support
  • Linux and MacOS executables
  • Lore?

THERE IS NO SAVE SYSTEM IN PLACE AT THE MOMENT!

I do plan on adding one in the near future but for the time being, the game resets everytime it is launched.

Do not hesitate to give feedback and suggestions in the comments!

You can listen to the VOID ATTACKERS OST with this Youtube link.
